Please select the person whom you want to sent the file to!
Are you sure you want to send the file
Selected file will be hidden inside an audio file, and sent to the receiver.
Selected file will be divided and hidden inside
Be sure to send all parts audio files, otherwise the receiver won\'t be able to extract the file.
File extracted!\nSwipe right to \"Extracted\" tab and press \"Refresh\" button to see the file!
Please download them and try extracting again.
Are you sure you want to exit WFS?
Looks like you are running this app for the first time. It is strongly recommended that you check out the help section before using this app.
1. Both sender and receiver MUST have WFS application installed. It is through WFS that sender can send the file and receiver can extract it.

2. To send any file, click on the blue SELECT FILE button. This will open your favorite pre-installed file browser, like ES File Explorer, Solid Explorer, etc. NOW Choose the file you want to send. WFS will prepare your file for sending, and WhatsApp will open. Select the person whom you want to send the file.\n Else, you can use WFS\'s inbuilt file browser(Located below the blue SELECT FILE button) to choose and send the file.\n

3. Now tell the person whom you sent the file to download and open WFS. Receiver can see the file(s) sent by the sender at RECEIVED Tab. To extract the received file, just tap on the it. Now swipe right to the EXTRACTED tab. (In case the file is not visible, click the red refresh button. If that too doesn\'t work, then make sure that all receiver has downloaded all the Mp3 parts sent by the sender.)

4. EXTRACTED Tab shows all the received files that have been extracted. click on red REFRESH button to see the original file sent by the sender. You can either tap on the file to open it or long press to delete it.

1. You might already be knowing that official WhatsApp allows users to send only audio and video files. You cannot send any other type of file. This is where WFS comes in. It lets you send ANY type of file through official WhatsApp.\n\n 2. HOW DOES WFS DO IT? WFS hides the file inside a small audio file, and sends this mp3 file(containing the hidden original file) to the receiver through the official WhatsApp. Receiver\'s WFS app reads this unique audio file and extracts the hidden original file from it. Neat! eh?
Unextracted received files. Tap to extract. Long press to delete.
Extracted Received Files. Long Press to Delete. Tap to Open.
